Documentation for PyD1 - A DataONE Client¶

PyD1 is a DataONE client written in Python. PyD1 provides programmatic access to the DataONE infrastructure that may be used as a command line tool for interacting with DataONE services, may form the basis of larger applications, or may be used to extend existing applications to utilize the services of DataONE.

PyD1 is a part of the DataONE Investigator Toolkit (ITK), and is developed as part of the DataONE project.
